pr_title: FIX: proper handling of group memberships

droid_missed: Pagination offset edge case - next action caps offset at user_count causing empty last page

validation_notes.droid_false_positive: Comment #5 about template path was a false positive - the template naming follows the same convention as all other admin views in the codebase
key_findings: Droid found 2 unique bugs that golden missed (alias_level and template binding)
Golden found 1 unique bug that droid missed (pagination edge case)
Both found the findMembers async issue and the HTTP method mismatch in tests
Droid had one false positive about template naming conventions
